title: It's Got Last Year's Chip!?
description: Sign up today for Oracle's CloudWorld event hosted in Las Vegas from October 17th - 20th and use code DEVY to save $400 at the link here:    LISTEN TO THE TECH NEWS:  GET MERCH:  SUPPORT US ON FLOATPLANE:  LTX EXPO:   NEWS SOURCES:  --------------------------------------------------- Timestamps: 0:00 absolutely spot on 0:11 iPhone 14, iPhone 14 Pro 2:29 Apple Watch Series 8 ULTRA 3:45 New Airpods Pro 4:22 Oracle Cloud World 4:58 QUICK BITS 5:05 PS5 redesign 5:40 Ryzen moinbile naming scheme 6:13 Tencent invests in Ubisoft 6:51 Twitch removing Host Mode 7:26 Loab the AI art cryptid 7:59 NFT guy suggests ''real-life NPCs'  FOLLOW US ELSEWHERE ---------------------------------------------------   Twitter:  Instagram:  Facebook:

The punch old sausage. - How is it made?
